data.text: Di mee deenei la go di hiihai ni Dimaadua
Gidaadou gu haga balumee a Mee,
“Gei Mee gu duadua i di hagaduadua
Gei Mee gu haga mmaemmae mai i tadau huaidu,
Gidaadou huogodoo la guu hai gadoo be nia siibi ala ne nngala.
“Mee nogo hai go digaula hagahuaidu huoloo,
Mee gu lawalawa gu gabunga gu hai loo gii made,
Mee guu dugu gi lodo taalunga dalia digau huaidu,
I muli hua di mouli o di hagaduadua,
Malaa, gei Au gaa wanga gi Mee
